author: Pepper
title: Pretty fun
review:
I got this game for Christmas in 2006. It is pretty fun.

pros.
fun
catapault
easy to play

cons.
too short
you start on one side of the bored and end on the other (I mean the bored is folded up to start and you race to the middle and then once you get to the middle REALLY starts) although it was a good idea

Overall, it could have been better, Axonn was cooler.

 

(I'm counting building experience as play experience)
